briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Safety, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of Ivacaftor in Subjects With Cystic Fibrosis Who Are Less Than 24 Months of Age and Have an Ivacaftor-Responsive CFTR Mutation
officialTitle: A Phase 3, 2 Part, Open-Label Study to Evaluate the Safety, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of Ivacaftor in Subjects With Cystic Fibrosis Who Are Less Than 24 Months of Age and Have an Ivacaftor-Responsive CFTR Mutation
summary: The purpose of this study was to evaluate the safety of ivacaftor treatment, and PK of ivacaftor and metabolites in participants with cystic fibrosis (CF) who are \<24 months of age at treatment initiation and have an ivacaftor-responsive CF transmembrane conductance regulator (CFTR) gene mutation.

primaryOutcome.measure: Part A: Safety and Tolerability as Assessed by Number of Participants With Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs) and Serious (TEAEs)
